name: Penguin Toss
description: Toss your penguins through multiple levels of evil seals. You are the bear champion, armed with your mighty catapult. The evil seals may try to trick you with different formations, bad weather, and exotic locals - BUT YOU WILL NOT BE FOOLED.  Launch the penguins, destroy the seals, win glory, fame and the envy of your peers.  Penguin Toss.
